讁字的基本解释

讁
zhé
同“谪”。

讁字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhé］
［《集韻》陟革切，入麥，知。］
同“謫1”。“適4”的被通假字。

讁字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【言字部】　讁； 康熙笔画：22； 页码：页1185第30
【廣韻】同謫。【小爾雅】責也。【詩·邶風】室人交徧讁我。【傳】責也。【周語】秦師必有讁。【註】猶咎也。【前漢·武帝紀】發責吏穿昆明池。【師古註】吏有罪者，發而役之。　又【揚子·方言】過也。南楚以南，凡相非議人謂之讁。【郭註】讁，音賾，謂罪過也。亦音適，罪罰也。　又【集韻】通作適。【詩·商頌】勿予禍適。【毛傳】過也。韓詩云：數也。【朱傳】適、讁通。【前漢·武帝紀】發天下七科讁出朔方。【史記·大宛傳】作七科適。

讁字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
讁字的起名意思

暂无。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Youji 1】【Words Department】　讁; Kangxi Strokes: 22; Page Number: Page 1185 Page 30
[Guangyun] The same ban. [Little Erya] Responsibility too. [Poetry·Bei Feng] The people in the room talked to me all over. [Biography] Responsibility too. [Zhou Yu] Master Qin must have obscurity. [Note] I'm still to blame. [Previous Han·Wu Diji] Distributed the officials to pass through Kunming Pool. [Shigu Note] The guilty official will be slain.　[Yangtze Dialect] again. To the south of South Chu, wherever critics are called, it's slander. [Guo's Note] Zhe, sound zhe, it is also a sin. The sound is suitable, and the punishment is also.　[Jiyun] It's all suitable. 【Poetry·Commercial Song】Don't let misfortune be appropriate. [Mao Chuan] It's too. Han Shiyun: Count it. [Zhu Chuan] Appropriate and Confucian. [Pre-Han·Wu Emperor Ji] The seven disciplines of the world originated from Shuo Fang. 【Historical Records·Dawan Biography】Seven subjects are suitable.
